text: <@U0K8ZSHN0>
<@U0K8ZSHN0|lee> has joined the channel

hey all,

in the last few days i’ve come aboard a number of us have talked and we have a bunch of progress in motion.  Let’s regroup at 2pm today to look at some ideas for how to use the space and equipment/facilities within.  

To mentally prep think about:
1.  How we could use the space we saw the other day
- <@U0HPGQ4KH>  has some ideas.  We’re playing in the realm of _scenarios_ for the space.  Not fully figured out and literal - yet - but something that can spark stakeholder imagination.
- I’d like to ask <@U02E3CRMA> to stay close to Felix and I in figuring out what this space should and shouldn’t accomplish

2.  The kinds of services and facilities that the space should include/offer
- <@U0K8ZSHN0>  I’d like to see what kind of progress you can make on list today before you head out
- How <@U02F8LF2X>  can pick this up next week
- And how <@U02E3CRMA>  and Felix can stay close to it so that we shape the offering

hit me with questions in the mean time.
do we have a template from the last proposal, thinking of new format - intel zoo
Leah / I believe used it for Japanese Gardens as well
yeah <@U0HPGQ4KH> have that stuff covered.
its a bit down the line. <@U026NB2U2> thinking we should develop some visuals and equipment list/sense of costs for yoru initial chat on sept 27
cool, can i have the original file please
the source?  yeah but dont worry too much about the deck, yet :slightly_smiling_face:
<https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B23RBiJCK0JRWFNlSGM2Ul9GYTQ>
yes, i don’t but wanted to have it to soon dump stuff into :slightly_smiling_face: so cheers for the link
dont have access, so please send as a zip file (or grant access)
oof.  sorry rob put this together yesterday.  just aded ya
still not working
I put in 3 different options for electronics manufacturing equipment
also known as surface mount technology (SMT) production lines
the vendor and model numbers are meant to be examples and not necessarily the exact ones we need
there are quite a few vendors that make these pieces of equipment
they are meant to be modular and interchangeable

thanks to everyone that rallied with me at 2pm!  I thought Felix did a great job giving us something to have a conversation around and we’re building on the momentum of good questions and ideas.  

I’m connecting with <@U026NB2U2>  [to mostly ensure that I’m not steering us off the rails, haha]  Will post proper meeting notes once I’ve connected with him.  

Based on what we discussed I think the following action items and next steps move us forward significantly:
- what if we wanted to build the first 100-1000 units of Sommely?   Well what does that mean exactly?  Not everyone understands all of the pieces? <@U02E3CRMA>  is diagramming out
from there, we can look at what we can do in the space, what an offering pkg might be, market app etc.  *but it all starts with understanding.* 
- <@U0HPGQ4KH>  mock up of the bldg exterior transformed into the home of PMMC.  A photo real version and an illustrated version for reaction/testing.
- <@U0HPGQ4KH>  ideas for how to paper prototype model that allows us to block out the space and configure it a number of ways based on equipment/service needs.  

I’m hoping to regroup Tuesday.  Will touch base on Monday to see how everyone is feeling.  Happy weekend in the mean time
